de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.index.tree.spatial.rstarvariants.query

Class RStarTreeRangeQuery<O extends SpatialComparable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.index.tree.spatial.rstarvariants.query.RStarTreeRangeQuery<O>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatabaseQuery, RangeQuery<O>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EuclideanRStarTreeRangeQuery

    @Reference(authors="J. Kuan, P. Lewis",
           title="Fast k nearest neighbour search for R-tree family",
           booktitle="Proc. Int. Conf Information, Communications and Signal Processing, ICICS 1997",
           url="http://dx.doi.org/10.1109/ICICS.1997.652114")
public class RStarTreeRangeQuery<O extends SpatialComparable>
extends Object
implements RangeQuery<O>
    Instance of a range query for a particular spatial index. Reference:

    J. Kuan, P. Lewis
    Fast k nearest neighbour search for R-tree family
    In Proc. Int. Conf Information, Communications and Signal Processing, ICICS 1997

    Author:
    Erich Schubert
